DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , randomize , cross-over study evaluate effect food pharmacokinetics single oral dos RO5045337 patient solid tumor . The anticipated time study treatment 3 week .
DOC.brief_title: A Study RO5045337 Patients With Solid Tumors
DOC.criteria: Adult patient , > /=18 year age Histologically confirm solid tumor Life expectancy > /=12 week ECOG performance status 0 1 Adequate bone marrow , renal hepatic function Patients receive investigational agent therapy administer intention treat malignancy within 28 day prior study start Patients preexist gastrointestinal disorder Patients uncontrolled intercurrent illness
